text: hi everyone today i will make a
vegetarian version of shredded chicken
rice which is a specialty of hoi an the
dish has all the items that you can
normally find on a plate of gum gang hoi
ang but surprisingly there's no meat
let's get cooking
ingredients you will need white rice
zaitan or white gluten onion some
vietnamese mint garlic lime straw
mushrooms dried shitake mushrooms leek
soy sauce turmeric powder sugar five
spice powder some vegan oyster sauce
pepper mushroom stock powder salt
vinegar and vegetable oil you also need
vegetable stock cooked from some daikon
cabbage and carrot i also add a few
pieces of dried shitake mushrooms for
more depth of flavor bring to a boil and
cook for about 30 minutes over medium
low heat you also need some vegetable
pickles made with shredded carrot and
daikon i tossed a cup of shredded carrot
and daikon with a tablespoon of sugar
and a tablespoon of vinegar
next in a pan saute some minced leek
until fragrant add the rice which have
been rinsed and drained cook and stir
for a minute then add half a teaspoon of
mushroom stock powder a dash of turmeric
powder and a pinch of salt mix well and
transfer to a rice cooker add vegetable
stock to barley cover the rice then
press to cook in a rice cooker until
done next finely dice the straw
mushrooms also remove the shitake
mushrooms from the stock and finely dice
next in a pan saute some minced garlic
and mince leek until fragrant then add
the rice mushrooms season with some soy
sauce vegan oyster sauce mushroom stock
powder and sugar together with about 50
ml vegetable stock simmer on low for 2
minutes and then take off the heat next
pat the wheat gluten dry and pan fry
until golden brown on all sides leave to
cool and shred along the grain like you
normally shred chicken finely slice half
an onion and soak in a bowl of cold
water in a bowl combine some salt
mushroom stock powder sugar lime juice
stir well and have a taste it should
have a great balance between sweet sour
and savory drizzle the sauce over the
shredded zaitan add the sliced onion
chopped vietnamese mint toss well and
transfer to a serving plate together
with the cooked rice the pickled carrot
and daikon the mushroom sauce and a side
bowl of vegetable soup combine all items
of the dish in one bite you will enjoy a
burst of flavors and textures in your
palate so yummy that all your family's
members gonna finish it in just a blink
i wish you success with the recipe don't
forget to click like and subscribe to my
channel for more recipes like this i
will see you the next time bye
[Music]
[Music]
